title: Those who begged shall soon receive

embed.description: Hi there, I’m Pabro, a Product Manager, on the LoL Personalization Content Team (aka Skins team) and I’m here to give you all an update on Championship Riven as she will be hitting PBE very soon. http://i.imgur.com/McxeyuI.jpg Worlds is a special time of year, and with the introducti

replies.body: I don't even care about that. I'm just waiting for the Zed one to come {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Is it though? is it reeeally?
It is, but only people who own it get the whole skin, people who buy it now get less.
It just a saddest thing ever for original Championship Riven Owner like myself .... the sense of uniqueness is no more

Are you really having a whinge here?

You get a better skin than everyone else.

Everyone else is paying the same you did, for a worse skin.
